Room.Name: Main Courtyard East
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the eastern entrance to a broad alley used as a jousting run.
Room.LongDescription: The wide alley runs to the east between the main building of Castle Ragnar and the great storage rooms on the south. Several squires are walking giant war horses while a number of knights stand in groups, getting ready to make a run down the jousting path. On the west side is a thick hedge, and further south there is a small arms practice area. Directly north is the preparation area and the eastern entrance to the main building.
